text: Shruti Sharma is an Indian actress known for participating in India's Next Superstars, playing Dhanak Parekh in Gathbandhan and Shayari Ahmed in Yehh Jadu Hai Jinn Ka!. ==Career== Sharma made her television debut in 2018 when she participated in Star Plus's India's Next Superstars where she finished as a runner up and received a special mention. In 2019, she made her film debut with Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya opposite Naveen Polishetty. Next, Sharma played Dhanak Parekh in Colors TV's Gathbandhan opposite Abrar Qazi. In 2020,she portrayed Shayari Ahmed in Star Plus's Yehh Jadu Hai Jinn Ka!. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! Year ! Show ! Role !
